root.name: Blockids
root.description: OverviewÂ Blockids is a Breakout style game which features various power ups and camera angles. There are two different modes of play in Blockids; adventure and challenge. There are six different selectable characters to choose from in the adventure mode. The object of adventure mode is to collect the five magic crystals. The goal of each level is to either remove all the blocks from the screen or to defeat a boss. Boss levels show up every ten levels.
